description: Kiki is a 13-year-old witch-in-training, living in a small rural village where http://anidb.net/ch40118 [her mother] is the resident herbalist. According to witches` tradition she has to leave her home at the age of 13 and find a place in http://anidb.net/ch40121 [another town] where she can stand on her own feet even though flying on her broom is the only skill she can master so far.
name: Kiki
